notesStmt.note: With a pasted-on strip bearing letterpress English text: "A brief description of Breda, and the barronie thereof, represented in this mapp aboue".
Also issued, without the letterpress, in at least some copies of: Hexham, Henry. A true and briefe relation of the famous seige of Breda: Delft, 1637.
Identified as STC 3596 at eel 1196; number cancelled in STC (2nd ed.), and referred to STC (2nd ed.) 13685.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
